name: Mib Digdug roswell mod
description:
Mib mod of the Digdug roswell game by Daniel Fessler, new sprites, sounds and tweak on the enemies with new screens for intro and victory. Once again great work by Daniel Fessler, Noah Duncan, Danny Rogers and the team for the retro remake competition 2006.

'Our version of dig dug gives reason to the original
In ours - it takes place right after a UFO crash landing.
You, the hazmat, have to go in there and kill all of the
alien creatures. We added alot of features to our game
that the original couldn't dream of - things like particle
effects, screen shakes, and multi-tile objects. We also
added obsticles to get in your way and improved the AI
of the enemy by using A* path finding. Our game has 5 worlds
with 3 levels in each world.

we also included a level editor - its not user friendly, but
its not hard to get used to.'
